Package scripting.idlescript

Class IdleScript

java.lang.Object
scripting.idlescript.IdleScript
Direct Known Subclasses:
AIOCooker, AIOFighter, AIOSmelter, AIOThiever, AKMiner, ArrowMaker, BuyFromShop, ColeslawGuildFisher, DamRc, DropEverything, EssenceMiner, Flaxx0r, FletchnBankBows, GetMeToArdougne, HarvesterTrainer, HerbHarvester, HerbIdentifier, LimpySnapez, MineGoldCraftingGuild, PowercraftTalisman, PowerFletcha, SellToShop, ShearSheep, SmithGearSet, SmithingVarrock, SpinStrings, Woodcutting
public abstract class IdleScript
extends java.lang.Object
This is the base class from which all IdleScript scripts are derived; this class also contains interrupts called by patched client hooks.
Author:
Dvorak

  • Method Details

    • serverMessageInterrupt

      public void serverMessageInterrupt​(java.lang.String message)
      Called by MessageCallback every time a new server message is drawn on the screen. Override this in your script to process these messages.
      Parameters:
      message - -- variable containing the message.

    • chatMessageInterrupt

      public void chatMessageInterrupt​(java.lang.String message)
      Called by MessageCallback every time a new chat message is drawn on the screen. Override this in your script to process these messages.
      Parameters:
      message - -- variable containing the message.

      public void start​(java.lang.String[] parameters)

    • paintInterrupt

      public void paintInterrupt()
      This will be called by DrawCallback every game frame. Override this in your script to paint on the screen.
